title: Whats The Best Skin in the game?
body:
**Honest, my fav is championship riven, whats yours?**
http://i57.tinypic.com/zpnix.jpg[/IMG]

replies.body: GROOOOOVVVY ZILEAN, THIS SKIN IS WHY THIS GAME IS SO SUCCESSFUL ANYONE WHO SAYS OTHERWISE IS AN ENEMY TO THE NATION AND DESERVES TO BE STABBED

Honestly?
Well im an assassin type player, so my fav skins would be weird 2 u guys:
Number 1: Shockblade Zed
Number 2: DJ Sona
Number 3: TPA Shen

Best skin huh...

Redeemed Riven or Chrome Rammus

Commando Garen would be my favourite but it is ruined by the beret. It makes him look sooooooo gay, it ruins it all. He is supposed to be the "Manliest Demacian ALIVE!" Make it a helmet or remove the headpiece completely please.

> [{quoted}](name=DiamondAries,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=tMGYU6ww,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-06-09T01:47:29.704+0000)
>
> Best skin huh...
> 
> Redeemed Riven or Chrome Rammus
> 
> Commando Garen would be my favourite but it is ruined by the beret. It makes him look sooooooo gay, it ruins it all. He is supposed to be the "Manliest Demacian ALIVE!" Make it a helmet or remove the headpiece completely please.

A beret means a soldier, usually a very skilled one bordering on SF. Also there are the Green berets who are/were SF ne ways, how much manlier can   you get?

I know all that, my dad was in the military for 10 years. He has a maroon one because he was a paratrooper. 

I'm not in anyway saying that in real life (military) berets are pissy or unmanly, because I hold a very high respect to the people protecting my country. However, for pure aesthetic purposes, I think a helmet or no head gear at all would make him look better.
Either DJ sona or Super galaxy rumble

This is so hard to answer. Because what makes a skin "the best"? I have Spirit Guard Udyr, that's cool. I really like Neon Strike Vi because I brought the skin as a reward for myself ages ago and it reminds me of a time when my skills actually got me places :/

Also, jumpsuits OP. srs rito make more champs in jumpsuits pls.

There is also Zombie Brand. An excellent skin in quality and humour. Play bots. Choose Brand. Pick Zombie skin. Max attack speed. Laugh arse off at flailing zombie arms.

Warring kingdom's nidalee.

It's one badass fucking cougar.
I have no clue why but I LOOOOVE Jurassic Kog'Maw
